summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Ordinance 123177, which adopted the 2010 Budget, including the 2010-2015 Capital Improvement Program (CIP); changing appropriations to various departments and budget control levels, and from various funds in the Budget; adding new projects and revising project allocations for certain projects in the 2010-2015 CIP; creating a position; making transfers between various City funds; making cash transfers between funds; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
